title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.15 - Emergency and authority vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.15 - Emergency and authority vehicles

State Regulations

Upon the approach of any ambulance, police or fire department
or authority vehicle, giving adequate warning by means of a siren or warning
lights, all traffic shall proceed off the bridges on to the right-hand side or
shoulder of the connecting highway and/or bridge approach
roads. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5504.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
